btrplace.solver.choco.transition

Interface NodeTransition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Transition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BootableNode, ShutdownableNode

    public interface NodeTransition
extends Transition
    Interface to specify a transition that manipulates a node.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      solver.variables.IntVar getHostingEnd()
      Get the moment the node is no longer capable of hosting VMs.
      solver.variables.IntVar getHostingStart()
      Get the moment the node is being capable of hosting VMs.
      Node getNode()
      Get the node manipulated by the action.
